name: 刘嘉璇
greetingText: I really like your name, especially the word '璇'
wishText: 愿今后每一岁好花常有，好梦长留 ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee!许多关于祝福的俗话..
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: 其实真的想说很多祝你生日快乐的话balabala
replayText: 想把所有的祝福全送给你
